|vo_06_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Battle.ogg
|vo_06_04_tx         = 싸우는 건 귀찮아. 나한테 전투는 목적이 아니라 수단이야. 전투라는 수단을 통해 포기할 수 없는 것들을 지키는 거지. 이런 점에서 우린 닮은 것 같아
|vo_06_04_rm         = Ssauneun geon gwichana. Nahante jeontuneun mokjeogi anira sudaniya. Jeonturaneun sudaneul tonghae pogihal su eopneun geotdeureul jikineun geoji. Ireom jeomeseo urin dalmeun geot gata.
|vo_06_04_tl         = It's annoying to fight. To me, combat is not an end, it's a means. We protect things that we cannot give up through the means of battle. I think we are alike in this respect.

|vo_07_02_tx         = 부탁을 받았으면 성의를 다 해야 하지. 우리 왕생당은 특별히 두 배의 책임을 짊어져. 이승과 저승 사람 모두를 만족시켜야 하거든
|vo_07_02_rm         = Butageul badasseumyeon seonguireul da haeya haji. Uri wangsaengdang'eun teukbyeolhi du bae-ui chaegimeul jilmeojyeo. Iseunggwa jeoseung saram modureul manjoksikyeoya hageodeun.
|vo_07_02_tl         = If I got a request, I have to do my best. The Wangsheng Funeral Parlor is especially responsible for double the responsibility. We have to satisfy both the people of this world and the otherworld.

|vo_08_06_tl         = It seems like Xingqiu is writing a book? Is it a story book? Or scary stories? I want to tell him all my experiences. It would be fun to make all of them into a book.

|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiao.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 선인의 일을 내가 어떻게 알겠어? 어머머, 천기누설은 금물이라구! 나한테 묻지 마!

|vo_08_09_title      = 각청에 대해…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Keqing]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Keqing.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 「옥형」각청… 친해지기 힘든 사람이야. 헤헤, 그 진지한 모습은 진짜 놀리고 싶다니까~ 설마 검으로 내 머릴 내려치진 않겠지? …그치?
|vo_08_09_rm         = "Okhyeong" Gakcheong... chinhaejigi himdeun saramiya. Hehe, geu jinjihan moseubeun jinjja nolligo sipdanikka~ seolma geomeuro nae meoril naeryeochijin ankejji? Geuchi?
|vo_08_09_tl         = "Yuheng" Keqing... she's a person that's hard to get close to. Hehe, I really want to tease her serious face~ she won't slam my head with her sword, right? ...Right?

|vo_08_10_title      = 향릉에 대해…

|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiangling.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 향릉은 정말 재밌어! 살짝 건드리기만 해도 깜짝깜짝 놀란다니까! 이쪽 사람들은 향릉 같은 애를 제일 좋아해~ 그래도 수위 조절은 필수야. 안 그럼 누룽지한테 혼나거든
|vo_08_10_rm         = Hyangreung'eun jeongmal jaemisseo! Saljjak geondeurigiman haedo kkamjjak'kkamjjak nollandanikka! Ijjok saramdeureun Hyangreung gateun aereul jeil joahae~ geuraedo suwi jojeoreun pilsuya. An geureom nurungjihante honnageodeun.
|vo_08_10_tl         = Xiangling is really fun! You'll be surprised if you touch it a little by little! People on this side like Xiangling the most. Still, not crossing the lines is a must. If you don't, you'll get in trouble with Guoba.

|vo_08_11_title      = 운근에 대해…

|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yun Jin.ogg
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_tx         = 운근은 정식적인 자리에서 되게 우아한데, 사적인 자리에선 정말 쉽게 친해질 수 있어! 전에 그녀와 내기를 했는데, 진 사람이 자기만의 창법으로 상대방이 적은 가사를 부르는 거였어. 후후, 연극 톤의 츄츄가는 꼭 한번 들어봐야 한다니까!
|vo_08_11_rm         = Ungeuneun jeongsikjeogin jarieseo doege uahande, sajeogin jarieseon jeongmal swipge chinhaejil su isseo! |vo_08_11_tl         = Yun Jin is very elegant in formal occasions, but you can get along really easily in private occasions! I made a bet with her before, and the loser sang the lyrics with his own singing style. Huhu, you have to listen to the theatrical hilichurl song!

|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shenhe.ogg
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_tx         = 그녀는 참 재밌는 사람이야, 다른 사람들과는 다르지. 있지, 내가 지금부터 매일 선인초와 산 이슬을 먹고 마시면, 그녀처럼 속세에 물들지 않은 듯한 사람이 될 수 있을까? 헤헤…
|vo_08_12_rm         = Geunyeoneun cham jaemitneun saramiya, dareun saramdeulgwaneun dareuji. Itji, naega jigeumbuteo maeil seoninchowa san iseureul meokgo masimyeon, geunyeocheoreom sokse-e muldeulji aneul deuthan sarami doel su isseulkka? Hehe...
|vo_08_12_tl         = She is such a fun person, different from others, You know, if I eat and drink divine herbs and the dew of the mountains every day, can I be a person like her who looks like someone who is not influenced by the world? Hehe...

|vo_09_01_title      = {name} 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 첫째 츄츄는 아프고, 둘째 츄츄는 병을 봐주네, 셋째 츄츄는 약초를 캐고, 넷째 츄츄는 달이네, 다섯째 츄츄는 죽고, 여섯째 츄츄는 들어 올렸네~
…헤헤
|vo_09_01_rm         = Cheotjjae chyuchyuneun apeugo, duljjae chyuchyuneun byeong'eul bwajune, setjjae chyuchyuneun yakchoreul kaego, netjjae chyuchyuneun darine, daseotjjae chyuchyuneun jukgo, yeoseotjjae chyuchyuneun deureo ollyeotne~ ...Hehe.
|vo_09_01_tl         = Firstborn hilichurl is sick, secondborn hilichurl takes care of sickness, thirdborn hilichurl digs up herbs, fourth hilichurl is a moon, fifth hilichurl dies, and the sixth hilichurl lifted~ ...Hehe.
|vo_09_02_title      = {name} 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 골목에 숨어있는 어둠의 시인, 그게 바로 나야!
|vo_09_02_rm         = Golmoge sumeoitneun eodum-ui si'in, geuge baro naya!
|vo_09_02_tl         = The poet of darkness hiding in the alley, that's me!
|vo_09_03_title      = {name} 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 나한테 「왕생당」 일은 별로 어렵지도, 무섭지도 않아. 그냥 좀 번거로울 뿐이지. 근데 사람들은 밤에 우리가 일하는 것만 봐도 벌벌 떨어대니. 휴~ 그 사람들은 뭘 몰라!
|vo_09_03_rm         = Nahante "Wangsaengdang" ireun byeollo eoryeopjido, museopjido ana. Geunyang jom beongeoroul ppuniji. Geunde saramdeureun bame uriga ilhaneun geotman bwado beolbeol tteoreodaeni. Hyu~ geu saramdeureun mwol molla!
|vo_09_03_tl         = For me, "Wangsheng Funeral Parlor" work isn't that hard nor scary. It's just a bit of a hassle. But people tremble when they see us working at night. Phew~ they don't know anything!
|vo_09_04_title      = {name} 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 난 「왕생당」의 77대 당주고 우리 할아버지는 75대 당주셨어. 내 첫 업무는 바로 할아버지의 장례를 치르는 거였지. 하하, 의외지? 이 일을 한 지도 꽤 됐네…. 시간 참 빨라
|vo_09_04_rm         = Nan "Wangsaengdang"ui chilsipchildae dangjugo uri harabeojineun chilsibodae dangjusyeosseo. Nae cheot eopmuneun baro harabeoji-ui jangryereul chireuneun geoyeotji. Haha, uioeji? I ireul han jido kkwae dwaetne... Sigan cham ppalla.
|vo_09_04_tl         = I am the 77th director of "Wangsheng Funeral Parlor", and my grandfather was the 75th director. My first job was to hold my grandfather's funeral. Haha, it's a surprise, right? It's been a while since I did this... Time flies so fast.
|vo_09_05_title      = {name} 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 음양은 질서 정연하고, 운명은 수시로 변하지. 죽음은 예측할 수 없지만, 나름의 규칙이 있어. 언제 어디서나, 어떤 이유에서든 인간은 「죽음」을 경시해선 안 된다는 거 잊지 마. 죽음을 이해하고 존중해야지만 삶의 가치를 깨달을 수 있어
|vo_09_05_rm         = Eumyang'eun jilseo jeong'yeonhago, unmyeong'eun susiro byeonhaji. Jugeumeun yecheukhal su eopjjiman, nareumui gyuchigi isseo. Eonje eodiseona, eotteon iyueseodeun inganeun "Jugeum"eul gyeongsihaeseon an doendaneun geo itji ma. Jugeumeul ihaehago jonjunghaeyajiman salmui gachireul kkaedareul su isseo.
|vo_09_05_tl         = Yin and Yang are orderly, and fate changes from time to time. Death is unpredictable, but it has its own rules. Don't forget that humans shouldn't belittle "Death" anytime, anywhere, for whatever reason. Only when you understand and respect death can you realize the value of life.

|vo_10_01_title      = {name}의 취미...
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 맑은 하늘, 광활한 바다, 밝은 달이 떠 있는 이 경치엔 시 한 수 읊기 딱이지!
|vo_10_01_rm         = Malgeun haneul, gwanghwalhan bada, balgeun dari tteo itneun i gyeongchien si han su eulpgi ttagiji!
|vo_10_01_tl         = A poem is perfect for this scenery with clear skies, vast seas, and a bright moon!
|vo_10_02_title      = {name}의 고민...
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 휴, 뭐 재밌는 거 없나…. 빈둥대는 건 죽는 것보다 더 끔찍해
|vo_10_02_rm         = Hyu, mwo jaemitneun geo eopna... Bindungdaeneun geon jukneun geotboda deo kkeumjjikhae.
|vo_10_02_tl         = Phew, is there anything fun.... Fooling around is more terrible than dying.

|vo_10_03_rm         = ♪Rarara~ Saengseonjeongorirang saeumandujirong~
|vo_10_03_tl         = ♪Lalala~ Steamed fish and shrimp dumplings~

|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 청심 슬라임 응축액 볶음… 우웩… 향릉이 나한테 복수하는 건가…?
|vo_10_04_rm         = Cheongsim seullaim eungchugaek bokkeum... uwek... Hyangreung-i nahante boksuhaneun geonga...?
|vo_10_04_tl         = Qingxin slime condensate fries... ugh... is Xiangling revenging to me?

|vo_11_01_rm         = Joa joa. I dangjunimi i yorireul wihae sireul han su jieojuji&mdash;

|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 오늘 밤은 하늘에 별도 총총하고 달도 아름다운 게 좋은 날이 될 것 같아. 어디 보자… 음~ 알아, 네 생일이잖아! 이야, 정말 좋은 날이야~
|vo_12_01_rm         = Oneul bameun haneure byeoldo chongchonghago daldo areumdaun ge joeun nari doel geot gata. Eodi boja... eum~ ara, ne saeng'irijana! Iya, jeongmal joeun nariya~
|vo_12_01_tl         = I think tonight will be a good day with stars in the sky and the beautiful moon. Let's see… well, I know, it's your birthday! Wow, it's such a great day~

|vo_13_02_tx         = 응응, 좋아~ 고마워!
|vo_13_02_rm         = Eungeung, joa~ gomawo!
|vo_13_02_tl         = Mhm, good~ thank you!
|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 이럴 수가! 호두 지금 힘이 막 샘솟는 것 같아. 자신감이 넘쳐!
|vo_13_03_rm         = Ireol suga! Hodu jigeum himi mak saemsotneun geot gata. Jasingami neomchyeo!
|vo_13_03_tl         = Oh my! Hu Tao thinks her power is surging right now. I'm full of confidence!
|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 힘이 최고치에 달하면 그때부턴 마음에 대한 시련이 시작되지. 네 덕분에 여기까지 올 수 있었어. 여기선 마음과 영혼이 구름이 돼서… 삶과 죽음, 그리고 천지 만물이 전부 우리 손에 있는 것만 같아
|vo_13_04_rm         = Himi choegochie dalhamyeon geuttaebuteon maeume daehan siryeoni sijakdoeji. Ne deokbune yeogikkaji ol su isseosseo. Yeogiseon maeumgwa yeonghoni gureumi dwaeseo... samgwa jugeum, geurigo cheonji manmuri jeonbu uri sone itneun geotman gata.
|vo_13_04_tl         = When the strength reaches its peak, the ordeal of the mind begins. Thanks to you, I was able to get here. Here, the mind and soul become clouds... it's like life, death, and everything in the world is in our hands.
}}
